name: NGHTMN
description:
What is the game "NGHTMN"?
-When you have no margin for error.
-When you are making the destiny of the character.
-Is when you get for passing level about 100 achievements.
-It's a pleasant time killer.
-When you have a goal and many obstacles.

In fact, the game "NGHTMN" old school platformer . The game has 30 levels. From the lungs ,a smooth transition to the really difficult levels. A game in which you all the time on the edge of the blade.One wrong move and you're dead.And in addition music, which really gives you relax and move forward.

We have already implemented:

-Achievements;

-Trading cards;
